data.title: Lucas completes point guard picture for SVG as Pistons add NBA vet
data.meta_description: John Lucas III never played for Stan Van Gundy, but he knew exactly what to expect when he signed on with the Pistons. "He's very intense, but I also played for his brother (Jeff, in Houston), who was very intense, and then I played for (Chicago's Tom Thibodeau), who is just as intense as both of them," Lucas said after going through his first Pistons practice on Monday.
